#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long long int t,n,a,b,c,i,j,k,ctr;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
              cin>>n>>a>>b>>c;
              ctr=0;
              for(i=0;i<=a;i++)
              {
                               for(j=0;j<=b;j++)
                               {
                                                k=n-(i+j);
                                                if(k>=0)
                                                {
                                                        if(k>=c)
                                                        {
                                                                ctr=ctr+c+1;
                                                        }
                                                        else
                                                        {
                                                                ctr=ctr+k+1;
                                                        }
                                                }
                               }
              }
              cout<<ctr<<"\n";
    }
}
